about_the_game:
Eydigard is an RPG rooted in Norwegian folk tales, set in the fjords of Northern Norway during the tumultuous early 16th century. A devastating plague has ravaged the land, leaving once-thriving farms abandoned and haunted, and allowing mythical creatures to claim the land.

As a mysterious mercenary shapeshifter, you'll navigate treacherous political waters and battle folkloric creatures to restore balance to this fractured fjord. With the power to transform into various animals, each with unique abilities, you'll carve your own path through this haunted fjord.

Key features:

Immersive Open World: Explore forgotten farms, enormous mountain halls, and bustling markets. Trade with merchants, wanderers, and even mythical creatures as you explore the rugged beauty of the fjord



Shapeshifting Mastery: Transform into various animals, each offering distinct skills for combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving. Sneak past enemies as a cunning lynx or overpower foes as a mighty bear - your chosen form shapes your strategy.



Norwegian Folklore: Encounter and interact with creatures from Norwegian and Sami folk tales, including trolls, hulders, and vettirs.




Dynamic Political Landscape: The fjord is home to rival clans, each with their own culture, ambitions, and secrets. Navigate the complex relations as your choices influence the balance of power and the fate of the region.

Plague Cleansing: Players are tasked with cleansing and restoring farmsteads affected by a devastating plague. Each farm offers distinct challenges and rewards. How you handle the plague's impact can affect your standing with the clans, the game's economy, and the overall state of Eydigard.



Cooperative Gameplay: While Eydigard offers a rich solo experience, team up with friends for cooperative gameplay. Combine your shapeshifting abilities to tackle challenges, engage in combat, and unravel the mysteries of the plague-ridden land together.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Eydigard is a coop RPG drawing from Scandinavian and Sami folklore. As an adventuring shapeshifter, you cleanse and reclaim farmlands infected by a relentless plague, while navigating the intricate politics of rival clans. Each decision impacts your path and the world around you.

English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
